text: Jose Santos Poyatos (born March 26, 1962 in Barcelona) is a track and field athlete from Spain. He has a disability and is a T41 type athlete. He raced at the 1976 Summer Paralympics. He came in second in 100 metre race and third in the long jump. == References == Category:Spanish sprinters Category:Living people Category:1962 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Barcelona Category:1976 Summer Paralympics Category:Spanish long jumpers
